Tool

NameTravel Time Calculation
IDtta_TravelTime
AuthorR.Fisher (c) 2015
File/usr/share/saga/toolchains/tta_TravelTime.xml

Description

Perform travel time calculation. Find further information at Rohan Fisher's web page on Travel Time Modelling with SAGA. References:
  • Myers, Bronwyn A., Rohan P. Fisher, Nelson Nelson, and Suzanne Belton. "Defining Remoteness from Health Care: Integrated Research on Accessing Emergency Maternal Care in Indonesia." (2015).
  • Ray, Nicolas, and Steeve Ebener. "AccessMod 3.0: computing geographic coverage and accessibility to health care services using anisotropic movement of patients." International Journal of Health Geographics 7.1 (2008): 63.

Parameters

NameTypeIdentifierDescriptionConstraints
Input
Destination Points Shapes (input)DESTINATIONS
Land Cover Grid (input)LANDCOVER
Travel Times Table (input)LANDCOVER_TO_TRAVELTIMEThis table supplies average travel times through a cell (in seconds) for each land cover type
Travel Time Zones Classification (*)Table (optional input)TRAVELTIME_LUTLook-up table for classification of travel time zones.
Output
Travel TimeGrid (output)TRAVELTIME_MINUTES
Options
Land Cover IDTable fieldFIELD_LANDCOVER
Travel TimeTable fieldFIELD_TRAVELTIME
(*) optional
